mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM Board b RIGHT JOIN sem_date s ON b.date BETWEEN s.start_date AND s.end_date WHERE s.sem_name=#{sem_name} AND board_name_id = '4' AND club_id = '1' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM Board WHERE board_name_id = '3' AND club_id = '1' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM Board WHERE board_name_id = '4' AND club_id = '1'
SELECT b.* FROM Board b RIGHT JOIN sem_date s ON b.date BETWEEN s.start_date AND s.end_date WHERE s.sem_name = #{sem_name} AND b.board_name_id = '4' AND b.club_id = #{club_id} ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM Board WHERE club_id = #{id} AND board_name_id = '3' ORDER BY date DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT Board(board_name_id, title, content, date, club_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{board_name_id}, #{title}, #{content}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s'), #{club_id}, #{start_date}, #{end_date})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, date = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s'), start_date = #{start_date}, end_date = #{end_date} WHERE id = #{id}
